text:
10. 所有橫額/標誌不能大於A4尺寸。
11. 於亞洲國際博覽館範圍內嚴禁攜帶及使用違禁藥物。
12. 於亞洲國際博覽館範圍內嚴禁售賣或派發未獲授權的商品或其他物品。
13. 嚴禁攜帶及發放煙花、煙火、或使用激光儀器。
14. 不准攜帶及使用任何遙控飛行設備或玩具(如：模型直升機、無人駕駛飛機)。
15. 如觀眾感到不適或需要協助，請盡快通知現場醫療或保安人員。
trans:
10. All banners/signs must not exceed A4 size.
11. The possession and use of illegal drugs are strictly prohibited within the AsiaWorld-Expo.
12. The sale or distribution of unauthorized goods or other items is strictly prohibited within the AsiaWorld-Expo.
13. The possession and distribution of fireworks, firecrackers, or the use of laser devices are strictly prohibited.
14. The possession and use of any remote-controlled flying devices or toys (e.g., model helicopters, drones) are not allowed.
15. If attendees feel unwell or need assistance, please promptly notify on-site medical or security personnel.
